## FieldColour class

Class for a colour input field.  Blockly.FieldColour

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class FieldColour extends Field 
```
<b>Extends:</b> [Field](./blockly.field.md)

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [clickTarget\_](./blockly.fieldcolour.clicktarget_.md) |  | any |  |
|  [COLOURS](./blockly.fieldcolour.colours.md) | <code>static</code> | string\[\] | An array of colour strings for the palette. Copied from goog.ui.ColorPicker.SIMPLE\_GRID\_COLORS All colour pickers use this unless overridden with setColours. |
|  [COLUMNS](./blockly.fieldcolour.columns.md) | <code>static</code> | number | Number of columns in the palette. All colour pickers use this unless overridden with setColumns. |
|  [CURSOR](./blockly.fieldcolour.cursor.md) |  | string | Mouse cursor style when over the hotspot that initiates the editor. |
|  [isDirty\_](./blockly.fieldcolour.isdirty_.md) |  | boolean | Used to tell if the field needs to be rendered the next time the block is rendered. Colour fields are statically sized, and only need to be rendered at initialization. |
|  [SERIALIZABLE](./blockly.fieldcolour.serializable.md) |  | boolean | Serializable fields are saved by the serializer, non-serializable fields are not. Editable fields should also be serializable. |
|  [size\_](./blockly.fieldcolour.size_.md) |  | any |  |
|  [TITLES](./blockly.fieldcolour.titles.md) | <code>static</code> | string\[\] | An array of tooltip strings for the palette. If not the same length as COLOURS, the colour's hex code will be used for any missing titles. All colour pickers use this unless overridden with setColours. |
|  [value\_](./blockly.fieldcolour.value_.md) |  | any |  |
